reviewText: DVD was empty - no files. Would not play on several blu-rays or laptop. Had to return. Movie is excellent though. Saw it on German TV.
The was great  I like it  and. Good film war movies

Even with the English subtitles, this was a compelling movie of the end of the war in East Prussia.  Since my mother was from Danzig and was also a refugee this showed some of the confusion, anger, angst, and joy that was met by the solders on both sides, and the civilians caught in the middle.
